verses.roman:
'muñi ye śikhāluṅ tore sphuruka sakala'
ei tomāra vara haite habe mora bala"

synonyms: muñi—I; ye—whatever; śikhāluṅ—have instructed; tore—unto you; sphuruka sakala—let it be manifested; ei—this; tomāra vara—Your benediction; haite—from; habe—there will be; mora bala—my strength.
translation: "Now, will You please tell me, 'Let whatever I have instructed all be fully manifest unto you.' By benedicting me in this way, You will give me strength to describe all this."
